data.description: Transmits entire directory structure via ftp
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module essentially adds two methods to a Net::FTP object, rput
    and rget, that will put or get, respectively, a directory structure.
    Since it adds the functionality, it inherits from Net::FTP, which is
    why I've chosen Net::FTP::Recursive as its namespace.
